resources.string: An intelligent assistant for fruitful cultivation is a need of farming community. Design a bot that can plough, water, and plant saplings on barren lands. The Croftbot should be able to measure the pH, NPK, moisture content etc in order to provide a sundry of nutrients to make the land arable.

Traditional method of parboiling by farmers involves soaking, steaming, drying and milling. But as it is a time consuming and highly laborious process, common man rather prefer rice readily available. Design a compact temperature based paddy rice parboiler for homemaker.

Due to complex nature of rubber tapping, skilled labour is required. High labour price is another added disadvantage. An automated rubber taping instrument for day to day collection needs to be designed and put in place.

Menstrual hygiene is a major problem for all women alike but becomes more acute for women having conditions like paralysis, autism, stunted mental growth, etc. Wearing pads for prolonged intervals of time, causes skin rashes and vaginal infections. Sanitary napkins that can provide alerts to the caretakers, when it is soiled, needs to be developed.
